name: sanitize
description:
Detects and masks sensitive information (such as passwords, API keys, tokens, etc.) from a given string. 
The function identifies patterns commonly used for sensitive data and replaces them with a mask.

params.name: text
params.description: The input string to be sanitized.

params.name: replacement
params.description: The replacement string to use as a mask for sensitive data. If not specified, defaults to "****".
